notes.text: sap.m.ComboBox: Events order fixed
sap.m.ComboBox: Fix failing tests on IE
sap.m.ComboBox: Items' loading indicator returned back
sap.m.GenericTile: Ellipsis not added for truncated test.
sap.m.InputBase: Max width and min width are now corrected
sap.m.MenuButton: do not set width to content button text when width is 0
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Fix failing tests on IE
sap.m.Page: contentOnlyBusy proper behavior
sap.m.Popover: Default sizes
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Blue outline on focus is now fixed
sap.m.SelectDialog: Focus after selection reset corrected
sap.m.Slider: Fix examples page under IE
sap.m.StepInput: fix boundaries when up/down + alt/ctrl is used
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Pressing close button triggers search event
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: pass tooltip to the StandardListItem
sap/m/ColorPalette: fix CSSColor dependency
sap.m - Table Designtime DomRef definition for items aggregation
sap.m.SearchField: on input suggestion event is now fired after 400ms
sap.ui.support: System Presets introduced and new System Accessibility Preset added
FacetFilter: Focus moves out of the reset button on second TAB
OverflowToolbar: Cleared focus info upon focus leave
m.routing: call TargetHandler in Targets instead of Router
sap.m.BusyDialog: Busy information now read out
sap.m.BusyDialog: The dialog is now closing correctly
sap.m.CheckBox: Type conversion removed
sap.m.DateTimePicker: Popup is now correctly displayed
sap.m.Dialog: ESC key sets 'origin' event parameter correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: search with relative item binding works now.
sap.m.InputBase: Padding corrected
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: doesn't wrap in ObjectPageHeaderContent in IE
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: button is not cut when displaying two months and years in Bulgarian
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: visual fix of the DatesRow on hover
sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions width is now correct
sap.m.Select: Fixed sample to follow Fiori Guidelines
sap.m.Select: Fixed sample to follow Fiori Guidelines
sap.m.Select: Rendering QUnits fixed for Edge
sap.m.SelectDialog: busyIndicatorDelay propagation fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection : Uploaded files were showing incorrect size so set property binaryFilesize as true so that file size formating uses base 2.
sap.m.Button: introduced propagation of the enabled property for RTA
Breadcrumbs: Font-size of separators is set to @sapMFontMediumSize
ComboBox: Selection when deleting value fixed
Image: Fixed broken indicator in some browsers
Improve Accessibility and slightly adjust Teasers
InputBase: NoTabStop icons now have tabindex -1
InputBase: inline-block display reverted
MessagePopover: popover on mobile closes after activeTitle is pressed
MessageView: Useless rerender call removed
ResponsivePopover: Rectursive invalidation prevented
sap.m - popover designtime fix
sap.m.Button: now checks if the domRef exists on onAfterRendering
sap.m.Dialog: Prevent infinite resize in IE and Edge
sap.m.Input: Soft keyboard is not opened on value help
sap.m.MessageView: Stuck on filtering fixed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Focus outline corrected
sap.m.MultiInput: Token information is now announced
sap.m.SlideTile - Do not propagate press event to inner tiles
sap.m.TextArea: Stop textarea "jumping" on counter update
sap.m.TextArea: growingMaxLies property fixed
sap.m.TimePicker - when pattern contains single quotes, mask is correct now.
sap.m.TimePicker: if binding format differs from input, "change" is fired
sap.m.Token: Token text properly displayed
sap.m.Wizard: Navigation in dialog improved
Aggregation Forwarding: also clone forwarded children
Image: Would not fire error if the source is invalid
InputBase: User selection of the icon removed
MultiInput: condensed mode icon position fixed
OverflowToolbar: CheckBox's label is aligned according guidelines
sap.m.ComboBox: Change event is now fired on highlighting on phone
sap.m.ComboBox: Double visual focus removed
sap.m.Dialog: Dialog footer is no longer flickering
sap.m.Dialog: Improve aria-labelledby
sap.m.LightBox: top corners have radius when picture is bigger then min dimentions of the LightBox
sap.m.MultiInput: Copy/pasting behavior documented
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: render parent div when empty
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Correct arrangement of the items in case parent has white-space set to nowrap
sap.m.Popover: Popover sets the focus to itself only when needed
sap.m.RangeSlider: Test page improved
sap.m.SplitContainer: Navigation now can be opened several times
sap.m.StepInput: correct behavior when mousewheel is used
sap.m.TabContainer: propagete properties to internal TabStripItem
sap.m.TextArea: Style overwriting
Breadcrumbs: QUnit test failure about font-size is fixed
CheckBox: Appearance in non editable form fixed
Select: Issue with selecting items in OverflowToolbar menu fixed
Toolbar: Icon padding in active mode fixed
sap.m.ComboBox: Navigate properly trough suggestion items
sap.m.MenuButton: do not set width to content button text when width is 0
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Redundant scrolling in tokenizer removed
sap.m.ObjectHeader: status rendered in correct column when the attribute is empty
sap.m.StepInput: correct valueState when setValue is called
sap.m.Wizard: Stable ID restored
Image: densityAware default is changed to "false"
FacetFilter: Filter dialog has an aria message
MaskInput: Accessibility exampe is improved
MessagePage: Fixed message page rule
MessagePopover: Log error when openBy DOM no longer visible
ObjectMarker: Accessibility info appears when in a table cell
ObjectMarker: New properties ariaLabelledBy & ariaDescribedBy
ResponsiveTable: Disable column designtime changes ...
Tokenizer: Indicator for one hidden token added
Variant Management Popover fixed for sap_belize_plus
sap.m.ComboBox: Focus handling corrected
sap.m.ComboBox: Focus handling corrected
sap.m.DatePicker/TimePicker: hide picker icon when disabled
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: customContent aggregation with sap.m.Link is read correctly
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Tooltips for icons provided in ACC page
sap.m.ObjectStatus: correct focus outline width
sap.m.SelectDialog: Cancel event documentation updated
sap.m.StepInput: Focus is fixed in HCB and HCW themes
sap.m.themes.base.HeaderContainer.less: Vertical Allignment set to Top.
OverflowToolbar: Fixed resetting of child size cache
sap.m.ColorPalette: add keyup event for space key
sap.m.PDFViewerDisplayTypes: change the enum according to the OpenUI5's code style
MessageView: Keyboard handling enhanced
sap.m.FeedInput: FeedInput Enhancements
sap.m.Table: Container-based pop-in behavior added
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Now the control implements its current visual specification
CheckBox: Ensure setSelected toggles the checked state correctly
MultiInput: Value Input is hidden if n-more is shown
m/TextArea: do not trigger FieldGroupValidation on enter

sap.m.GenericTile : In IE11 when a DOM Element which is only partially visible in the browser viewport gets the focus, the IE 11 browser shifts the element to make it fully visible in the viewport. This has conflict with UI5 event onTap detection.
sap.m.MultiInput: Close Dialog on Enter
sap.m.MultiInput: Fire change event on enter on mobile
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: doesn't throw error when given customContent is null
sap.m.ObjectHeader: prevent default actions, only when click is on its none-active parts
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Accessibility description corrected
sap.m.Wizard: Optional label fixed in branching case
sap.m.Wizard: nextStep handling in branching fixed
sap.m.WizardStep: Next button visibility adjusted
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Set the focus to the body after dialog is closed
sap.m.Dialog: Dialog is now positioned correctly on IOS devices
sap.m.MenuButton: Labelling improved
sap.m.Page: Initial rendering of floating footer corrected
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: shows selectAll checkBox at the correct position
Hyphenation: Hyphenation for text controls is enabled
MessageView: Accessibility improvements
sap.m.FeedListItem: Customizable MORE/LESS strings
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Two column layout added
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Headers now have role "button" for indicating that they are clickable
SegmentedButton: Fire event for OverflowToolbar when width is changed
sap.m.ComboBox: Deleting a special characters now work correctly
sap.m.DatePicker: InstanceManager support added
sap.m.DatePicker: does not throw error when max date is yesterday
sap.m.Dialog: Buttons inside dialog are rendered correctly now
sap.m.Input: InputType documentation is now correct
sap.m.InstanceManager: make documentation visible
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: now implements getAccessibilityInfo function
sap.m.ObjectMarker: Tabbing to icon-only ObjectMarkers enabled
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Fixed OverflowToolbar configuration
sap.m.StepInput: button icons enablement
sap.ui.core.Hyphenation: Playground page problem with encoding was fixed
sap.m.MessagePopover: Demokit sample fixed
CLDR: Update to CLDR version 34
GenericTile: Add wrapping type property
Table: paste event handling is added
Upload Collection 1902 Enhancements
sap.m.CheckBox/Select/ProgressIndicator: 5th semantic color
sap.m.Dialog: 5th semantic highlight color added
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Grouping items introduced
sap.m.RadioButton: Introduced 5th semantic highlight color
sap.ui.core.ValueState: 5th semantic highlight color added
sap.m.ColorPalette: Now the Dialog responds to the new size of the Color Picker
sap.m.ComboBox: Duplicated focus fixed
sap.m.Dialog: Minimum width on combi device is now corrected
sap.m.Input: Suggestion description text added
sap.m.Popover: Styles forwarding corrected
sap.m.StepInput: Now the floating numbers are correctly calculated
sap.m.TimePicker: Accessibility state improved
sap.m.Wizard: Multiple handler attachment removed
sap.m.themes.base.FeedListItem.less: RadioButton not rendered when FeedListItem used within ListItem.
sap.m.UploadCollection - Header params were not propagated correctly
sap.m.UploadCollection - Query.find fails for IDs containing colons, switch back to document.getElementById
sap.m.UploadCollection - items from aggregation of sap.m.List are not destroyed when removed
